articles.author: Marco Giannangeli, Sunday Express Diplomatic Editor
articles.title: Poland at 'tipping point' for Europe as it tries to seize control of US-owned news channel - Daily Express
articles.description: ATTEMPTS by Poland's ruling right-wing government to seize control of a US-owned news channel mark a 'tipping point' which could have far-reaching ramifications throughout Europe, it was warned last night.

articles.author: Victoria Michael
articles.title: EMA investigating link between Pfizer and Moderna vaccines and three new conditions - News Nation USA
